      Generates a certificate object and initialises it with the data read from the input stream is.
      This method uses CertificateFactory.

      The certificate provided in is must be DER-encoded and may be supplied in binary or printable (Base64) encoding.

      Generates a certificate object and initialises it with the data read from the file filename.
      This method uses CertificateFactory.

      The certificate provided in is must be DER-encoded and may be supplied in binary or printable (Base64) encoding.
      static java.security.cert.X509Certificate[] CertificateIoUtil.readX509Certificates(java.io.InputStream is)
      Returns an array of the X509 certificates read from the given input stream is.
      This method uses CertificateFactory.

      The is may contain a sequence of DER-encoded certificates in the formats described for generateCertificate.
      static java.security.cert.X509Certificate[] CertificateIoUtil.readX509Certificates(java.lang.String filename)
      Returns an array of the X509 certificates read from the given file filename.
      This method uses CertificateFactory.

      The filename may contain a sequence of DER-encoded certificates in the formats described for generateCertificate.
